item.title: 乌克兰在新贷款谈判前面临国际货币基金组织贬值压力
item.description: 乌克兰中央银行正受到国际货币基金组织的压力，要求将这个饱受战争摧残的国家的货币贬值，这一提议有可能在新贷款方案的关键谈判之前引发基辅的紧张局势。【原文：Ukraine’s central bank is coming under pressure from the International Monetary Fund to devalue the war-battered nation’s currency, a proposal that risks triggering tension in Kyiv ahead of crucial talks on a new loan package.】

item.title: 黄金矿商涨势乏力，涨幅超过金属涨幅
item.description: 几个月来，黄金的涨势令华尔街惊叹不已。黄金矿商的表现甚至更好，以至于投资者现在开始质疑纽蒙特公司（Newmont Corp.）、阿尼科-伊格尔矿业公司（Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd.）及其竞争对手的股票的历史性涨幅是否过高。【原文：Gold’s rally has awed Wall Street for months. Gold miners have done even better - so well that investors are now asking whether historic gains in shares of Newmont Corp., Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd. and their competitors have gone too far.】

item.title: 纽文垃圾债券基金削减 99% 的芝加哥学校债务
item.description: Nuveen 出售了主要持有的芝加哥现金拮据的学区债券，退出了持有近十年的债务头寸。【原文：Nuveen has sold major holdings of Chicago’s cash-strapped school district bonds, trading out of debt positions it has held for close to a decade.】

item.title: 保时捷新任首席执行官是一位擅长混合动力的豪华车领导者
item.description: 保时捷公司任命迈克尔-雷特斯（Michael Leiters）为下一任首席执行官，让这位曾在迈凯轮汽车有限公司（McLaren Automotive Ltd.）和法拉利公司（Ferrari NV）磨练出豪华车技能的德国工程师来领导公司扭亏为盈。【原文：Porsche AG named Michael Leiters its next chief executive officer, tapping a German engineer who has honed his luxury-car skills at McLaren Automotive Ltd. and Ferrari NV to steer a turnaround.】

item.title: 伦敦证券交易所老板称，英国养老金需要投资本地股票的理由
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团（London Stock Exchange Group Plc）的老板表示，英国养老基金需要更多的激励措施来持有英国股票。【原文：British pension funds need more incentives to hold UK equities, according to the boss of the London Stock Exchange Group Plc.】

item.title: 基金因债务交易变质在英国起诉内衣公司和受托人
item.description: 三家投资基金正在起诉荷兰内衣零售商亨克莫勒国际公司（Hunkemöller International BV）及其债务受托人，声称基金红木资本管理公司（Redwood Capital Management）接管该公司的交易侵犯了他们的债权人权利。【原文：A trio of investment funds are suing Dutch lingerie retailer Hunkemöller International BV and the trustee of its debt over claims that a transaction which saw fund Redwood Capital Management take over the company violated their creditor rights.】

item.title: 英国广播公司（BOE）的格林称工人的议价能力正在减弱
item.description: 英格兰银行利率制定者梅根-格林（Megan Greene）表示，工人们将更无力提高工资来弥补通胀的新一轮飙升。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Megan Greene said workers will be less able to boost their wages to compensate for a fresh spike in inflation.】

item.title: 中国 MMG 发现秘鲁非正规挖掘者造成的铜矿损失不断增加
item.description: 中资矿业公司MMG Ltd.提高了对其秘鲁特许矿区内因非正规挖掘而损失的铜矿量的估算，该矿区被指定为其下一个露天矿坑。【原文：Chinese-owned mining company MMG Ltd. has raised an estimate for the amount of copper lost to informal digging in an area of its Peruvian concession earmarked as its next open pit.】

item.title: 蒙特利尔银行首席执行官就主街的困境发出警告
item.description: 还有：蒙特利尔银行和道明银行的人事变动【原文：Also: People moves at BMO and TD】

item.title: 象牙海岸出口商因可可豆质量低劣而拒收可可豆
item.description: 由于霉菌和大量废料的存在，出口商拒绝接受运抵象牙海岸港口的大部分可可豆，在市场预期供应过剩的情况下，可可豆的供应情况却变得扑朔迷离。【原文：Exporters are rejecting the bulk of cocoa beans arriving at Ivory Coast ports because of mold and a high volume of waste material, muddying the supply picture when the market is expecting a surplus.】

item.title: 英国计划在 2026 年底制定稳定币规则，与美国保持同步
item.description: 英国央行的目标是在明年年底前出台新的稳定币法规，因为全球的政策制定者们都在努力控制数字货币的传播给金融稳定带来的风险。【原文：The Bank of England is aiming to have new stablecoin regulations in place by the end of next year, as policymakers around the world battle to contain risks to financial stability from the spread of the digital money.】

item.title: Huobi 创始人李林将推出价值 10 亿美元的以太币积累器
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，加密货币交易所Huobi的创始人、投资公司Avenir Capital的董事长李林正在与亚洲一些最早的以太坊支持者联手推出一个新的数字资产信托基金，该基金将购买以太币代币。【原文：Li Lin, the founder of crypto exchange Huobi and chairman of investment firm Avenir Capital, is joining forces with some of Asia’s earliest Ethereum backers to launch a new digital-asset trust that will buy Ether tokens, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利看空意大利瓶盖制造商的债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根士丹利的信贷交易柜台正在联系投资者，建议做空意大利瓶盖制造商 Guala Closures SpA 的债券。【原文：Morgan Stanley’s credit trading desk is contacting investors with a pitch to short the bonds of Italian bottle cap maker Guala Closures SpA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贷款损失加剧银行危机担忧，信贷市场摇摆不定
item.description: 新的贷款爆炸事件加剧了信贷风险担忧，并勾起了人们对 2023 年美国地区银行业危机的回忆，全球信贷市场岌岌可危。【原文：Global credit markets are on edge as fresh loan blowups fuel credit risk concerns and stir memories of the 2023 US regional banking crisis.】

item.title: 加拿大 HydroGraph 公司上涨 2000% 后将迁往得克萨斯州
item.description: 加拿大 HydroGraph 清洁能源公司的股价在一年内飙升超过 2000%，该公司正计划将注册地迁往美国，并在纳斯达克上市，以开拓更深层次的资本市场和国防工业需求。【原文：After a year in which its stock price soared more than 2,000%, Canada’s HydroGraph Clean Power Inc. is planning to change its domicile to the US and list on the Nasdaq to tap deeper capital markets and defense-industry demand.】

item.title: 卡扎克称欧洲央行将确保通胀率不低于 2
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马丁斯-卡扎克斯（Martins Kazaks）表示，欧洲中央银行将确保明年通胀目标的预期偏低不会变得更加明显。【原文：The European Central Bank will make sure a projected undershoot of the inflation target next year doesn’t become more pronounced, Governing Council member Martins Kazaks said.】

item.title: 1734 年西里西亚债券对俄罗斯冻结资产未来的启示
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 杰富瑞提高 IPS 贷款收益率以支付私募股权投资费用
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团公司（Jefferies Financial Group Inc）提高了 IPS 公司债务销售的定价，这将有助于向四年前收购该公司的私募股权公司 Centerbridge Partners 支付股息。【原文：Jefferies Financial Group Inc. sweetened the pricing of a debt sale for IPS Corp. that will help finance a dividend payment to Centerbridge Partners, the private equity firm that bought the company four years ago.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易言论引发美国需求乐观情绪，大豆上涨
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示威胁对中国征收高额关税的做法不可行，引发了人们对世界最大经济体将达成贸易协议的乐观情绪，大豆期货上涨。【原文：Soybean futures rose as US President Donald Trump said high threatened tariffs with China were not viable, sparking optimism that the world’s largest economies will move toward a trade deal.】

item.title: Trafigura 收购仓储公司 Grafton 的新加坡业务
item.description: Trafigura 集团收购了一家在新加坡拥有大量业务的金属仓储公司，因为亚洲物流枢纽堆积如山的过剩库存带来了利润丰厚的贸易机会。【原文：Trafigura Group has acquired a metals warehousing firm with sizable operations in Singapore, as a mountain of surplus inventory in the Asian logistics hub opens up lucrative trading opportunities.】

item.title: 乍得与巴菲特支持的非洲公园续签合作协议
item.description: 就在结束与非洲公园组织长达 15 年的合作之后几天，乍得再次与非洲公园组织合作管理其野生动物保护区。【原文：Chad has renewed its partnership with African Parks to manage its wildlife reserves, just days after ending a 15-year collaboration with the initiative, which drew funding from the Rob Walton Foundation and Howard G. Buffett.】

item.title: Robinhood 依靠婴儿和 401(k) 基金让每个人都参与交易
item.description:
在通过千禧一代和 meme 股票一举成名之后，这款流行的经纪应用正借助特朗普的东风进入 S&P 500 指数，甚至更远。【原文：

After making its name on millennials and meme stocks, the popular brokerage app is riding its Trump bump into the S&P 500 and beyond.

】

item.title: 尽管中美发生争执，香港仍不会征收特别港口费
item.description: 尽管中国和美国对彼此的船只征收特别费，但香港不会开始征收针对个别国家的港口费。【原文：Hong Kong will not start imposing port fees targeting individual countries, despite China and the US charging special levies aimed at one another’s ships.】

item.title: 据说合作伙伴集团将出售价值 3 亿英镑的伦敦办公室
item.description: 合伙人集团正准备出售伦敦保险区的一处价值 3 亿英镑（约合 4.02 亿美元）的写字楼，因为对高档房地产交易的需求出现了恢复的迹象。【原文：Partners Group is preparing to launch the sale of a £300 million ($402 million) office in London’s insurance district as demand for trophy real estate deals shows signs of returning.】

item.title: 银行在康卡斯特分拆之前为 Versant 提供 7.5 亿美元贷款
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）牵头的银行推出了 7.5 亿美元的杠杆贷款，作为康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp.【原文：Banks led by Morgan Stanley launched a $750 million leveraged loan as part of Comcast Corp.’s pending spinoff of cable-television channels.】

item.title: 对预算改善的押注增加，罗马尼亚债券表现出色
item.description: 随着罗马尼亚总理伊利-博洛扬（Ilie Bolojan）领导的政府继续解决预算赤字问题，罗马尼亚债券表现优于欧洲同行，本周收益率有望接近 10 个月低点。【原文：Romania’s bonds are outperforming European peers, with yields poised to end the week near a 10-month low, as Prime Minister Ilie Bolojan’s government continues to tackle the budget deficit.】

item.title: 德国财政部长抨击中国稀土出口限制
item.description: 德国财政部长拉尔斯-克林拜尔（Lars Klingbeil）批评了中国加强稀土出口管制的决定，并表示希望在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与中国国家主席习近平会晤后缓和局势。【原文：German Finance Minister Lars Klingbeil criticized China’s decision to tighten export controls on rare earths and expressed hope for a de-escalation following the meeting between US President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping.】

item.title: 特朗普就中国问题作出保证，股市上涨，地区银行发布报告
item.description: 周五股市在涨跌之间徘徊，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）试图缓解人们对与中国贸易战的担忧，而投资者则在该行业动荡之后研究了地区性银行的最新收益。【原文：Stocks shuffled between gains and losses on Friday, as President Donald Trump attempted to assuage fears around the trade war with China while investors examined the latest earnings from regional banks following turbulence in the sector.】

item.title: 苹果击败 ESPN 赢得一级方程式赛车美国流媒体播放权
item.description: 苹果公司获得了一级方程式赛车在美国的独家播出权，这是继美国职业足球大联盟和美国职业棒球大联盟之后的又一项体育流媒体业务。【原文：Apple Inc. secured the exclusive rights to air Formula One races in the US, adding to a sports streaming slate that already includes Major League Soccer and Major League Baseball.】

item.title: 央行行长认为哥伦比亚加息 "在望
item.description: 一位高级决策者表示，如果通胀前景进一步恶化，哥伦比亚可能需要考虑两年多来的首次加息。【原文：Colombia may need to consider its first interest rate increase in more than two years if the inflation outlook further deteriorates, according to a senior policymaker.】
